title: Love Shack
lyrics:
[intro - drum beat and spoken]
If you see a faded sign at the side of the road that says "15 miles to the
[start singing] (Eb)Love  (C)Shack!”
(Bb)Love Shack, ye-(C)ea-ah (Bb)
 
I'm (C)headin' down the A(Bb)tlanta high(C)way
(Bb) Lookin' for the (C)love (Bb)getaway
(C) Headed for the (Bb)love getaway
[spoken] I (C)got me a car, it's as (Bb)big as a whale
And we're (C)headin' on down to the (Bb)Love Shack
I (C)got me a Chrysler, it (Bb)seats about 20
So (C)hurry up and bring your (Bb)jukebox money!
 
[chorus]
The (C)love shack is a (Eb)little old place where (F) we can (Ab)get together (C)
(Bb)Love Shack, ba(C)by (a-(Bb)Love Shack, baby)
(C)Love Shack, baby, (Bb)Love Shack! (x4)
 
(C) Sign says (woo) (Bb)"Stay away, fools"
'Cause (C)love rules at the (Bb)Lo-o-ove Shack
Well, it's (C)set way back in the (Bb)middle of a field
Just a (C)funky old shack and I (Bb)gotta get (Ab)back
(C)Glitter on the mattress (Bb)
(C)Glitter on the highway (Bb)
(C)Glitter on the front porch (Bb)
(C)Glitter on the hallway (Bb)
 
[chorus]
The (C)love shack is a (Eb)little old place where (F) we can (Ab)get together (C)
(Bb)Love Shack, ba(C)by (a-(Bb)Love Shack, baby)
 
[bridge]
(C)Love Sha-ack, (Bb)that’s where it’s at! (x2)
 
(C)Huggin' and a-kissin', (Bb)Dancin' and a-lovin'
(C)Wearin' next to nothin', 'Cause it's (Bb)hot as an oven
The (C)whole shack shimmies (Bb)(Woooh!) (x2)
The (C)whole shack shimmies when (Bb)everybody's movin'
A(Eb)round and around and around and around!
 
(C)Everybody's movin', (Bb)everybody's groovin', baby
(C)Folks linin' up out(Bb)side just to get down
(C)Everybody's movin', (Bb)everybody's groovin', baby
(C)Funky little shack, (Bb)Funky little shack
 
[link - kazoo]
(C)  (Bb)  (C)  (Bb)
 
(C)Hop in my Chrysler, it's as (Bb)big as a whale and it's a(C)bout to set sail (Bb)
I (C)got me a car, it (Bb)seats about 20
So (C)come on and bring your (Bb)jukebox money!
 
[chorus]
The (C)love shack is a (Eb)little old place where (F) we can (Ab)get together (C)
(Bb)Love Shack, ba(C)by (a-(Bb)Love Shack, baby)
(C)Love Shack, baby, (Bb)Love Shack! (x4)
 
[link - kazoo]
(C)  (Bb)  (C)  (Bb) 
 
[bridge]
(C)Bang... bang... bang, (Bb) on the door, baby (C) [Knock, knock]
(Bb)Knock a little louder, baby
(C)Bang... bang... bang, (Bb) on the door, baby (C) [Knock, knock]
(Bb)I can't hear you
(Cm)Bang, baaang! (Bb) on the door, baby
(Cm)Bang, baaang! (Bb) on the door (Knock a little louder!)
(Cm)Bang, baaang! (Bb) on the door, baby
(Cm)Bang, baaang! (Bb)
Your (C)what? [stop]
[spoken] Tin roof! rusted.
 
[outro]
(C)Love Shack, baby, (Bb)Love Shack
(C)Love Shack, baby, (Bb)Love Shack (Love, baby, that's where it's at, yeah)
(C)Love Shack, baby, (Bb)Love Shack (Love, baby, that's where it's at)
(C)Love Shack, baby, (Bb)Love Shack (Baby, at the loooove shack)
(C-single strum) [end]
